result.reason: This is a UX improvement request about inheritance UI discoverability (folders showing all inheritable properties, default inheritance behavior) from 2018 — the maintainer already explained the current design in comments and the issue has been stale since 2021 with no actionable code change identified.
result.approach: Show all properties in folder config panel regardless of protocol filter, and set inherit-all as default for new connections — but scope is large and UX design decisions needed from maintainer
